title: HP Smart App - Google Play Store - Top User Issues

sample_reviews.content: terrible app. terrible printer. always goes offline

trying to hook up my WIFI to my envy6000printer on my Chromebook laptop computer it started out working then quit ! try to reset it back upa ndthe app is no longer useWht the hay do I do with this useless printer

Very poor quality app, has turned me away from HP products entirely. It's overcomplicated and seems to do anything but let you print. Every time I use it it's forgotten who I am, and it tries very hard to trick you into signing up for unnecessary subscription services.
App works fine but new UI landing page doesn't actually show any printer functionality.you have to scrol down the page or tap an icon, to do something. Very unintuitive.
I can't do anything from this app. I just spent 45 minutes trying to print 2 pages of a document. 2 pages!!! and in the end, I still have not gotten this app to work for me.
terrible app. terrible printer. always goes offline

trying to hook up my WIFI to my envy6000printer on my Chromebook laptop computer it started out working then quit ! try to reset it back upa ndthe app is no longer useWht the hay do I do with this useless printer
with the new updates I can no longer connect to my printer. ridiculous.
why do i need location, bluetooth, and other random nonsense permission for this to connect my printer in my own house.

It was a massive pain from the beginning. Why does it only use 2.4Ghz? After eventually getting it connect I find out that I can't even scan without creating an account. HP why do I have to create an account to use my freaking printer?! I don't want you collecting my data just to sell it to 3rd parties. All of these trash restrictions that are called features is ridiculous. What happened to being able to get a simple, no wifi printer that I can just connect via usb and use as I please?
new app does not allow full access to scan and copy functions. What kind of upgrade is this.
Not easy to scan. stupid warning messages on printer if I'm not logged in. HP has overcomplicated printing and scanning.

2 stars because it does technically allow me to scan and there are no Android alternatives for my HP AIO. This app is more of an advertisement/upsell effort by HP than a print & scan app. Close all the ads? They all come back seconds later. Also, why do I need to login to an HP account to use a 15+ year old device sitting on my own desk? Why can't I scan at 600dpi or greater? Before installing, check to see if your device is supported by the "Mopria" app so you can hopefully steer clear of this.

Convenient, useful, and helpful. I am using this app from 2018. It is one of the best mobile scanning documents to convert your physical documents to jpeg or pdf. It has never failed to impress me. It is also packed with superb functionalities to use your HP printer. Everything can be done from this HP Printer Smart app. Highly recommending it to anyone willing to get a scanning document app or if you are buying a HP printer on 2026, you will definitely need this app to setup your HP printer =)

It was a massive pain from the beginning. Why does it only use 2.4Ghz? After eventually getting it connect I find out that I can't even scan without creating an account. HP why do I have to create an account to use my freaking printer?! I don't want you collecting my data just to sell it to 3rd parties. All of these trash restrictions that are called features is ridiculous. What happened to being able to get a simple, no wifi printer that I can just connect via usb and use as I please?
good and easy yo install

absolute shite ! Incredibly complicated, unnecessarily protracted installion process ... Very poor punter / printer interface .... could not be more user unfriendly even if it was specifically designed to be so ! A complete waste of time to use ~ expensive, incompetent electronic junk ...ðŸ˜±

very easy setup great printer
this app has and bug
lag, slow loading
worst app and worst printer the app is really slow, always takes you to the website and you have to sign in every time you have to anything

Trying to add my printer after installing a new router and the app just crashes every time. The printer is now just an expensive lump of nothing as I can't connect using my phone and I don't have a PC.

I connect via WiFi and App is very intermittent by phone... I only see my ink levels about 1 in 50 times I connect... Initially I moaned about tablet support (as with tablet connected to WiFi then it can't connect to printer) but actually tablet is much better... Connect tablet to WiFi, Open HP app, Login & when printer appears, Switch tablet to printer... This always seems to work & I can finally Scan reliably. Still not perfect as Print Dashboard needs internet so that doesn't work :(
